Year: 2013
Genre: Adventure / Logic (Hidden objects)
Publication Type: RePack
Game  Language: Eng | Rus
Voice Language: Eng | Rus
Crack: Not required



System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (32-Bit), Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: Intel Pentium III 1,2 GHz, AMD Athlon XP 1200 +
Memory: 1 GB
Video Card: Nvidia Geforce 6600 or Radeon X300
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 1.5 GB

Game Information:

It's payback time for the sins of others and their own mistakes. 
Welcome to the abandoned old farm - the best place to celebrate Halloween. 
Learn what earthly sins hold here restless souls past inhabitants and save 
the company of friends from a terrible fate! 

Caution: Halloween!

All Saints Night - Time of reckoning for the sins of others and their own mistakes. 
Be careful when ancient artifact game gets into your hands! Dylan help save her 
careless friends, angering the ruler of darkness Simon, and to rescue their souls free.
To celebrate Halloween, students gathered at the old abandoned farm. Being on the threshold 
of the house, Dylan becomes a witness of something inexplicable. Having escaped miraculously, 
our heroine must come face to face with the ghosts - the former residents damn farm. 
To free friends girl must save all restless soul. And for this it is required to 
disclose the terrible crimes of the past.
Seek and use items, solve puzzles, and exciting surf the sinister farm in search of 
answers. Will Dylan save his friends and beloved? What happened in the midst of the 
fun? Why spirits can not leave this place? And most importantly - students who lured 
into a trap? Play and learn. Of course, if you are not afraid!
